na ha# smaq vai puqrA&gnirapa#raSuvRukNaM dahatiq tada#smai prayOqga Eqvar.Shi#rasvadayaqd-yada#gnEq yAniq kAniq cEti# saqmidhaqmA da#dhAqtyapa#raSuvRukNa-mEqvAsmai$ svadayatiq sarva#masmai svadatEq ya EqvaM 
~MvEdaudu#mbarIqmA da#dhAqtyUrgvA u#duqmbaraq Urja#mEqvAsmAq api# dadhAti praqjApa#tiraqgni-ma#sRujataq ta(gm) sRuqShTa(gm) rakShA(gg)#sya - [  ] 51
